Package net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.legacytext3

package net.kyori.adventure.text.serializer.legacytext3
A component serializer to convert legacy text 3 components to and from adventure Components.
  • Classes

    Description
    LegacyText3ComponentSerializer
    A component serializer betweeen text 3.x's Component and adventure's Component.
